metadata.title: Basic Web App Setup with Chat UI Skeleton

story.iWant: a clean web application foundation with basic chat interface structure
story.soThat: I have a working skeleton to build features on
story.tasks: - Initialize Next.js 15 project with TypeScript, Tailwind, App Router, ESLint - Initialize git repository with proper .gitignore - Verify local development server runs at localhost:3000 - Create basic chat container skeleton (verify app/, components/ structure) - Verify Tailwind CSS integration and rendering

story-context.acceptanceCriteria: 1. Next.js 15 app created using `npx create-next-app@latest zeroai --typescript --tailwind --app --eslint` 2. App runs locally on localhost:3000 3. Basic layout structure: `app/page.tsx`, `app/layout.tsx`, `app/globals.css` 4. Empty chat container component skeleton created 5. Project uses App Router (not Pages Router) 6. Tailwind CSS configured and working 7. Git repository initialized with `.gitignore`

docs.doc: - Project init command: `npx create-next-app@latest zeroai --typescript --tailwind --app --eslint` - Establishes: Next.js 15 with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ESLint - After initialization: `npm install openai zustand katex canvas-confetti nanoid` (in later stories)

- Base structure: app/, components/, store/, lib/, types/, public/ - DO NOT create empty placeholder directories beyond what create-next-app generates - App Router structure: app/page.tsx, app/layout.tsx, app/globals.css

- All components MUST start with 'use client' directive - Use @/ path alias for imports (configured in tsconfig.json) - PascalCase for component names (ChatContainer.tsx) - kebab-case for utility files (api-response.ts)
- Next.js or React app with TypeScript - Tailwind CSS for rapid styling iteration - Clean folder structure for maintainability

dependencies.node: - next: 15.x (latest) - react: 18.x - react-dom: 18.x - typescript: 5.x - tailwindcss: 3.x - eslint: 8.x - @types/node: latest - @types/react: latest - @types/react-dom: latest

story-context.constraints: - MUST use Next.js 15 with App Router (not Pages Router) - MUST use TypeScript for all code - MUST use Tailwind CSS for styling (no CSS modules, no inline styles) - MUST include ESLint configuration - DO NOT create components/, store/, lib/, or types/ directories in this story (created in later stories) - DO NOT install additional dependencies beyond what create-next-app provides - Working directory is /Users/reena/gauntletai/zeroai (parent of project) - After create-next-app, cd into zeroai/ directory for subsequent operations

tests.standards: - Manual testing only for this foundation story - No automated tests required - Verification checklist in Dev Notes section - Future stories (1.3+) will establish Jest/testing-library patterns
tests.locations: - No test files for this story - Future test location: __tests__/ or tests/ (to be established in Story 1.3+)
tests.ideas:
AC#1: Verify Next.js 15 installation - Check package.json contains "next": "15.x" - Check tsconfig.json exists with App Router config - Check tailwind.config.ts exists
AC#2: Verify local server runs - Run `npm run dev` - Access http://localhost:3000 in browser - Confirm default Next.js welcome page loads
AC#3: Verify base structure - Confirm app/page.tsx exists - Confirm app/layout.tsx exists - Confirm app/globals.css exists
AC#5: Verify App Router (not Pages Router) - Confirm app/ directory exists (not pages/) - Check package.json scripts use App Router patterns
AC#6: Verify Tailwind integration - Check globals.css contains @tailwind directives - Add test Tailwind class to page.tsx (e.g., bg-blue-500) - Verify styling renders in browser
AC#7: Verify git initialization - Check .git/ directory exists - Check .gitignore includes node_modules/, .next/, .env*.local
